issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
When I build using SDK 8.0.2, get this error.

[ERROR] Application received error: /Error.js:7
"use strict";require("core-js/modules/es6.date.to-json"),
                    ^
Couldn't find module: core-js/modules/es6.date.to-json for architecture: arm64
   at require@[native code]
   at (/ti.internal/extensions/Error.js:7:21)
   at global code(/ti.internal/extensions/Error.js:21:70)
   at require@[native code]
   at global code(/ti.main.js:24:8)

TitaniumKit 0x0000000101ae1b48 -[KrollBridge loadCommonJSModule:withSourceURL:] + 472
TitaniumKit 0x0000000101ae24b4 -[KrollBridge loadJavascriptText:fromFile:withContext:] + 84
TitaniumKit 0x0000000101ae39e0 -[KrollBridge require:path:] + 428
TitaniumKit 0x0000000101b19690 CommonJSRequireCallback + 120
JavaScriptCore 0x00000001ac1eb0d0 <redacted> + 356
JavaScriptCore 0x00000001ac1c766c <redacted> + 95468
JavaScriptCore 0x00000001ac1c5838 <redacted> + 87736
JavaScriptCore 0x00000001ac1afef4 <redacted> + 276
JavaScriptCore 0x00000001ac7005b0 <redacted> + 11056
JavaScriptCore 0x00000001ac92967c _ZN3J<â€¦>


Any ideas?
fields.summary: Build not running on IOS Device

comments.body:
[~peterladis],
Thanks for reaching out to us. Can you please explain more about the issue you are experiencing? It would be great if you can share a simple test project to reproduce the issue on our end.
Hello, Are you using any module in your app? Run a trace log on the project and send the log in here. Thanks.

Hello,
We have not heard back from you since our last update. Is the issue resolved? Please let us know if you need more help with this issue.

Hello! 

Were you able to resolve the issue? If you encounter any other issues as you move forward, feel free to ping us back.

Have a great day!
